AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing BanRole. This allows you to be able to ban/unban people by role.
See [p]help BanRole for commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: BanRole
SHORT: Allows banning and unbanning members by role
DESCRIPTION: Ban and unban members all at once by adding them to a role, then using a command to ban them!
